Text: I downloaded this and now I can't even play it.  The first screen comes up but I can't press on anything to start it.  Any ideas??

I have the same problem... =/
I can't play it in Media Player so I use VLC. And when I click on the buttons in the menu screen, nothing happens... What shall I do?
Plays perfectly when recorded to DVD media.  Subtitles crisp and clear.  Excellent DVD quality.  I love it!, so thanx honda93!!!  I will seed for others to enjoy.
